Package com.atakmap.android.routes.nav

Class RoutePanelViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.routes.nav.RoutePanelViewModel
  • public class RoutePanelViewModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for managing the state (e.g. speed, units, eta, etc.) for purposes of navigation.

    Note: This class is thread-safe.

        public void setUnits​(int units)
        Set the current speed units as part of the StateMode.
        Parameters:
        units - the units as defined by 0 = MPH, 1 = km/h, 2 = Kts, 3 = MPS
